import React from "react"; // import { Dialog } from "@material-ui/core"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Modal, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { CCard, CCardBody, CCol, CForm, CFormGroup, CFormText, CTextarea, CInput, CLabel, CRow, } from "@coreui/react"; import { getUsersById } from "src/api/apiUser"; const UsersTable = ({item}) => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const [userbyid, setUserbyid] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', nid: '', backAcc: '', details: '', phoneNo: '', address: '', }); const { firstName, lastName, email, nid, backAcc, details, phoneNo, address, } = userbyid; const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = (id) =>{ //alert(id) getUsersById(id) .then(response => setUserbyid(response.data)) .catch(err => alert("something went wrong")) setShow(true); } const handleChange = (e) => { setUserbyid({ ...userbyid, [e.target.name]: e.target.value } ) } const profileForm = () => (
) return ( <> Fill supplier Details {/* Form Start */} {/* User First Name User Last Name User Email User NID User Bank Account User Details Phone No User Address */} {/* Form End */} {profileForm()} {item.userName} {item.email} {item.lastName} {item.phoneNo} {item.address} Manager ); } export default UsersTable
